vulnerability.name: USN-4288-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4288-1 fixed a vulnerability in ppp. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that ppp incorrectly handled certain rhostname values. A  remote attacker could use this issue to cause ppp to crash, resulting in a  denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: ppp could be made to crash or run programs if it received specially crafted network traffic. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
